alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 1:23PM PST until December 30 at 9:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Plan on slippery road conditions, including during the evening commute tonight and morning commute Thursday. Additional snow accumulations of two to four inches are expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains above 5000 feet. * WHEN...Until 9 AM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
